item.title: Welcome to my new blog
item.description:
So I finally found the time to create a blog. I will write about many things, including the projects I’m currently working on and the problems I have to solve or stuff I plan to do in the near or far future.

For example some projects I plan to do in the future are

  • Virtual File System Library (C++, Multiplatform, Threaded)
  • 2D Game Engine (C++, Lua Scripting, Multiplatform)
  • Learn the cool new Vulkan API
  • and many more minor projects…

If you’re interested in a specific topic related to gamedev or programming be sure to leave a comment below.
